com.mr.http

接口 MR_Network

  • 所有已知实现类:
    MR_BasicNetwork

    public interface MR_Network
    An interface for performing requests.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      MR_NetworkResponse performRequest(MR_Request<?> request)
      Performs the specified request.

    • 方法详细资料

      • performRequest

        MR_NetworkResponse performRequest(MR_Request<?> request)
                                  throws MR_VolleyError
        Performs the specified request.
        参数:
        request - Request to process
        返回:
        A MR_NetworkResponse with data and caching metadata; will never be null
        抛出:
        MR_VolleyError - on errors
